ygData.subject: Re: Riposte Skill
ygData.msgSnippet: Riposte traditionally is to counterattack after a parry (fencing term).  I GUESS thats what it would be in the game as well... Jaade, Indigo Sista Soldier.
ygData.messageBody:
Riposte traditionally is to counterattack after a parry (fencing term). I
GUESS thats what it would be in the game as well...

Jaade,
Indigo Sista Soldier.
